mapper.insert: insert into attend_check(num,id,attenddate,point) values(event_seq.nextval,#{id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), nvl((select point from attend_check where num=(select nvl(max(num),0) from ATTEND_CHECK where id=#{id})),0))
mapper.select: select * from attend_check where id=#{id} and TO_CHAR(attenddate,'YYYY-MM-DD')= #{attenddate}
select count(*) from attend_check where id=#{id} and TO_CHAR(attenddate,'YYYY-MM') = #{date}
mapper.update:
update ATTEND_CHECK set status='Y', point=#{point} where id=#{id}
and attenddate=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')
